July 8, 1901 D Pontypridd Contest (Class B)
Pontypridd Contest (Class B) 20 Test Piece Contest Pontypridd Contest pontypridd-contest-class-b

Euryanthe [unknown arranger]
Ynys-Angharad Park, Pontypridd, Glamorgan Prizes - 1st £12 and shield, 2nd £7, 3rd £4, 4th £2. 7 bands competed. 11th annual South Wales and Monmouth Contest.
Sept. 13, 2017, 12:45 p.m. Aug. 27, 2018, 7:08 p.m.
